name: The Operational Art of War, Vol. 1: 1939-1955
name_original: The Operational Art of War, Vol. 1: 1939-1955
description:
The Operational Art of War, Vol. 1: 1939-1955 is a strategy game developed by TalonSoft. It came out on 01-01-1998. TalonSoft published the game.
You can play The Operational Art of War, Vol. 1: 1939-1955 on PC.
